name: libretext
description: Collection of frontend and backend scripts. Dependencies should be kept in subfolders.

scripts.install-all: find . -type d \( -name node_modules \) -prune -false -o -type f -name "package.json" -exec npm i {} \;
scripts.update-all: find . -type d \( -name node_modules \) -prune -false -o -type f -name "package.json" -exec npm update {} \;
